metaData.descriptionCS: The child is presented two words that represent common objects or concepts and describes how they are similar.

questions.title: Sample Item. Red-Blue
questions.correctInstructionsHTML:
Correct response [Any response with the word colors]:

Say, Let’s try another one.
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response [Any response without the word colors or failure to respond]:

Say, Red and blue are both colors.

questions.title: †Item 1. Pen-Pencil
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

†Say, A pen and a pencil are both things you write or draw with.

questions.title: †Item 2. Milk-Water
questions.incorrectInstructionsHTML:
Incorrect response:

†Say, Milk and water are both liquids or fluids, and you drink them.

Fun; Can go outside and play in them

consecutiveZerosDiscontinueRule.description: This subtest discontinues after 5 consecutive scores of 0 points.
